name: Pixel Light
description:
Use mouse to interact and select in the dialogue scene.

WASD moves in the main game and E interacts.

Pixel Light is a game about childhood dreams. How many kids dreamed of going in to fairyland? And... Were them all ONLY dreams? Pixel Light works on this: is it a dream or is i not?

Have fun guessing it. <3

Hello guys, I'm very happy to present you our little game.

It has flaws (a lot hahaha), but it was a rush to engage in my first game jam, so I don't have high hopes for ranking, but I appreciate any tips you guys can share.

Thank you so much.
